alert.note: Alert for Cleburne (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 11:34AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cleburne County through 1215 PM CDT... At 1134 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Abernathy, or 12 miles east of Heflin, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ranburne, Abernathy, Trickem, I 20 Welcome Center and Micaville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
